title: Best Price Fenway studio with spacious kitchen heat and hot water incl
posting_body: The monthly rent includes heat and hot water and gas!
Elevator & Laundry & Bicycle storage in building.
It located on 60 Queensberry Street Boston so it's close to 55 Bus (Copley/Prudential area), 47 Bus (Cambridge Central Sq), E-line Museum or Fine Arts T-stop.
D-line Fenway T-stop and short walking distance to Longwood medical area, Simmons College, Emanuel College, Berklee school of Music etc.
There are Target, Star market, 7 eleven, movie theater and variety shops and restaurants, etc within 2-5min walking distance.
This studio is on top floor, high ceiling, large windows, hardwood floors, in spacious living area, spacious closet, a full size bathroom, eat-in Kitchen with refrigerator and gas range.
